title: /Remake is broken.

embed.description: Watch Liquidwarlock's League of Legends video: Most tilting FB in history of top lane? Then they remake...wtf!! - Plays.tv

body: People can /Remake even if no one is afk or DC, meaning people can use it once the game starts becoming less favorable.

replies.body:
Enemy (midlaner) Kennen was afk/dc.

Seems like they saw they gank coming, someone did /remake making the vote live. Then the others voted yes after the first blood.
